about_the_game:
Get ready for a new adventure with SherloCat, the most charming detective kitty in the gaming world, now in the heart of Rio de Janeiro! In SherloCat Nonogram Rio, you'll be challenged to solve nonograms inspired by Rio's iconic landmarks, such as Sugarloaf Mountain, Christ the Redeemer, and Copacabana Beach.

Picross, also known as hanjie or nonogram, is a very popular puzzle game worldwide that tests your problem-solving skills. You are presented with a grid of squares that can be filled in or left blank. Your goal is to fill in the empty squares according to the provided clues to reveal the hidden image. New to this type of game? Don’t worry! This game features various difficulty levels, offering an enjoyable experience for everyone and helping you become a Picross champion!

Choose your experience! There are two game modes. The classic mode is for those who want a cozy experience - relaxing and pressure-free. The challenge mode, on the other hand, includes a timer, error limits, and everything you need to challenge your mind.

Discover Rio in Every Puzzle

Immerse yourself in the Carioca atmosphere as you solve creative and challenging nonograms. Each puzzle is a challenge that captures the cultural and natural essence of Rio, turning your gaming experience into something curious and engaging!

Game Features:

- Two game modes: classic mode for a relaxing experience and challenge mode for 🤯

- A mix of mechanics (classic Picross and a small investigation story)

- Level sizes: from 5x5 to 25x25, offering 120 levels of varying difficulty, perfect for beginners and brain teasers alike, as well as for seasoned nonogram masters

- Relaxing music

- Hints to keep you from overthinking too much (if you want!)

- Clean and beautiful design

Choose between a super relaxing experience in classic mode or push your logical thinking and focus to the limit in challenge mode! Complete all 120 nonograms and discover, in the end, where Sherlock Holmes is.

The visuals and soundtrack will make you forget all your worries and have a blast!

name: SherloCAT Nonogram Rio

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win 10
  • Processor: 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Explore Rio de Janeiro through nonogram puzzles! Challenge your logical skills with challenges inspired by the iconic landscapes of Rio, charming graphics, and a touch of mystery. SherloCat Nonogram Rio is perfect for puzzle lovers of all levels.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
